title: Harvard Square Loft: 2 full bath, Chefs Kitchen, Garage, Yard
posting_body: No Fee Harvard Sq Loft: 3BD/2BA, Chefs Kit, Garage plus off street parking, Yard, Central AC and Fireplace.
Beautiful Loft, Bell and Fandetti post and beam townhouse located on Professor's Row.
This house features: - Heated garage plus an additional off-street parking place providing 2 car private parking.
- Cathedral ceiling w built-Ins, large windows, and a wood-burning stove/fireplace.
-The main level includes a spacious open concept living/dining/kitchen area-which is perfect for entertaining.
The Chef's kitchen is fully equipped w/high-end Stainless Steel appliances including a 36" Viking stove and hood and granite countertops.
- The master BR has windows which look out over the canopy of a large maple in the backyard and you can see the moon and stars at night.
- Other features include a study, 2 full bathrooms, in unit washer/dryer, central A/C, new furnace, a fenced private yard with deck and a lot of wood, natural light and hardwood floors throughout.
